definition: to explore/to search out/to scout/to visit/to stretch forward
dagger-axe/abbr. for 戈瑞[ge1 rui4]/(Tw) abbr. for 戈雷[ge1 lei2]

sentences.english: Sorry, I'm engaged for this tango .
sentences.chinese: 对不起，这曲探戈我已有约在先了。

sentences.english: Val, who was light and nimble on her feet, learnt to dance the tango.
sentences.chinese: 脚步轻盈灵活的瓦尔学会了跳探戈舞。

sentences.english: He introduced me to the Tango .
sentences.chinese: 他是我的探戈舞启蒙老师。

sentences.english: This piece of music is suitable for tango.
sentences.chinese: 这支曲子适合跳探戈舞。

sentences.english: See the argentine tango performance demonstration in this free dance lesson video.
sentences.chinese: 看到这个自由舞蹈课视频的阿根廷探戈表演示范。

sentences.english: The concert ended with a tour de force performance of Piazzolla's Tango Suite.
sentences.chinese: 音乐会以皮亚左拉的动感十足的探戈组曲结束。

sentences.english: Cambalache is the name of a Tango song in Argentina.
sentences.chinese: Cambalache是阿根廷一首探戈曲目的名字。

sentences.english: A tango was playing on the jukebox…
sentences.chinese: 点唱机播放着一首探戈舞曲。

sentences.english: My passion for tango disguises a fearfulness.
sentences.chinese: 我对探戈的激情掩饰着一个恐惧。

sentences.english: Music written in duple time for dancing the tango .
sentences.chinese: 为探戈谱写的一种双拍子乐曲。

sentences.english: Leslie works in a gay Tango Bar.
sentences.chinese: 何宝荣在一家同志探戈酒吧工作。

sentences.english: A pair of performers is performing Argentine tango.
sentences.chinese: 一对表演者在表演阿根廷探戈舞。

sentences.english: Clapping rhythms for four count flamenco dance steps can be used on dances like the tango and rumba.
sentences.chinese: 四计数弗拉门戈舞步节奏拍手可用于像探戈，伦巴舞。

sentences.english: I don't care for the tango.
sentences.chinese: 对不起，我不想跳探戈舞。
